Rest: Getting plenty of rest can help your body fight off the infection and recover more quickly.
Humidifiers: Using a humidifier can help add moisture to the air, which can help ease congestion and make breathing easier.
Saline nasal sprays: These can help loosen and flush out nasal secretions, which can help reduce congestion.
Over-the-counter pain relievers: Medications like acetaminophen or ibuprofen can help reduce fever and alleviate body aches.
Gargling: Gargling with salt water several times a day can help soothe a sore throat.
